title: Oh boy, I love the Dante's Inferno references for Gatekeeper Galio

embed.description: The Special/Hidden/Secret Interactions for the reworked/updated legendary skin, Gatekeeper Galio. Purchase RP via Amazon (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows all the specific taunts Gatekeeper Galio has. Stay upto date with information by following me on twitter: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights This video is 100% accurate at the time of creation, PBE is constantly changing so things might change in a couple patches.

body:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inferno_(Dante)
Limbo, Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Wrath, Heresy, Violence, Fraud, Treachery.

You guys did your homework. Nice.

replies.body:
Disappointed he didn't say something along the line of this to Jhin

"Circle 4, Ha you wish it's Circle 5 for you."
so Ahri is Lust, not Evelynn? what
Last time I checked Evelynn doesn't fuck the men she assassinates.

Well JohnODyin (The one who wrote this) is working on the Evelynn VGU, so he probably knows more about Eve then most 

:P
Can I ask for who's on Urgot'S lore team, it was Lonewingy iirc right

Actually, Gem Lim (Lonewingy) is a **concept artist** on Team Alpha, which is working on Galio and Evelynn.

I'm not sure, but I think that the writer on Urgot might be David “Interlocutioner” Slagle.
All of this is correct
Oh, wow. Haha, thanks for the confirmation.
Ah gotcha usually get the names of the art and lore people confused

Hiding details about future rework?
CIRCLE 4
I'm really curious as to what direction you're taking her.
Eve has sex appeal yeah, but if you take a look at Ahri's lore, she had sex with numerous people just to take their souls so yeah, the Circle of Lust would be appropriate for that.
Technically she just "seduces" them, doesn't automatically mean sex.
Ah Dante's Inferno. One of my longtime favorite Hack-And-Slash games. So glad Riot made some interesting references to that game.

......

Can't tell if trolling.

Well that's how I knew The Divine Comedy tbh. I've heard about it, but I never went in depth in it until I played Dante's Inferno (video game) that was developed by EA. 

Sorry if this threw you a bit off mood. Just sharing my take on this.
They made references to the literature not to the game lol. That's why he thought you were trolling.

Yeah, I wasn't bothered. Just legit couldn't tell if you knew that the game was ripping hard on the Divine Comedy. 

I'm not the guy who downvoted you. No hard feelings. Just, you know, that's a critical piece of work.

I know that buddy don't worry. A lot of the game's material was influenced from The Divine Comedy itself. I just thought that the game itself would explain that piece of valuable literature much easier.

Oh boy the _Divine Comedy_!

_reads for first time._

 ...That wasn't funny...
https://pics.onsizzle.com/hey-u-cant-put-the-pope-in-hell-thats-where-15729908.png Basically this

Do people in America study italian literature? Like do you guys know Petrarca, Boccaccio or the renaissance? 
I'm asking because I'm curious and I honestly didn't know that european literature was studied in America. I know that Dante should be studied by everyone but damn I wasn't expecting americans to understand every reference... good job!
It depends. For highschools, many Literature teachers can choose what they want to teach kids. So, as long as it is Classical Literature, and is approved by the school, it can be taught.
Thank you for telling me
Even in Eu almost nobody does. apart from the weirdos like me, studying roman languages. Im sad now QQ
So... the Nexus is a "living crystal". This seems oddly specific seeing as Nexi are non-canon. Aren't they?
They shouldnt. Even though they are still mentioned in nocturnes lore in the gameinfo. GG Rito Games
Yeah it was pretty awesome to see the references to The Divine Comedy :D
i was kinda surprised the Matricide comment was for Sej and not Sona, now im curious.
I was more surprised by his comment toward Ashe. Circle 9? That's for Treachery...

I made a special post on these boards about the ashe interaction. maybe there's something that clears it up for you.
I really love this skin :3

So gatekeeper galio can reference graves having a cigar (not actually in the game), but graves can't have his cigar in the game?


(please don't remove it, riot).
What surprised me more is that he gets circle 3 (gluttony) for smoking. Either I got something wrong or they did.

A smoker smokes daily due to an addiction to cigarettes. It's an over consumption, just like food. 
I think circle 3 is perfect for Graves.
{{champion:41}} will be sentenced to ALL THE CIRCLES!
Who'd he betray? That and Fraud don't really have any indications of happening. (not saying they didn't, but GP seemed to be rather straight forward with his ruthlessness.)
He killed his own father.

I know that is in his old lore, but it is no longer guaranteed canon (however likely it may be). However re-reading his bio, story, and Miss Fortune's bio; He is still guilty of treachery because he came back to steal the guns he had made a deal to buy.
Can't wait to see if we'll have some more quotes from the Commedia of Dante in the italian version of the voiceover
Man, you really can't appreciate these references without reading Inferno first.
I'm kinda surprised there's no Thresh interaction.
